dmca.title: Copyright infringmnet - NikTaz.com - TakTaz.com - DanceAge.com ParsNava.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: avanesian@aol.com [mailto:avanesian@aol.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 01, 2006 5:41 PM
To: Copyright; legal@Copyright@theplanet.com; Legal;
legal-response@thepla; abuse; copyright@ev1.com; legal@ev1.com;
abuse@ev1servers.com; abuse@ev1.comheplanet.com; Legal Response;
abuse@ev1.com
Subject: Re: Copyright infringmnet - NikTaz.com - TakTaz.com -
DanceAge.com ParsNava.com


 SECOND REQUEST
 
Please remove the entire Taraneh music catalog from indicated websites
 
 
-----Original Message-----
From: avanesian@aol.com
To: Copyright@theplanet.com; legal@Copyright@theplanet.com;
legal@theplanet.com; legal-response@thepla; abuse@theplanet.com;
copyright@ev1.com; legal@ev1.com; abuse@ev1servers.com;
abuse@ev1.comheplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com;
abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@ev1.com; legal@ev1.com;
abuse@ev1servers.com; abuse@ev1.com
Sent: Wed, 29 Nov 2006 1:44 PM
Subject: Copyright infringmnet - NikTaz.com - TakTaz.com - DanceAge.com
ParsNava.com


 
 
 



To Whom It may Concern: 
1-                 DanceAge.com
2-                 TakTaz.com
3-                 NikTaz.com
4-                 ParsNava.com
5-                 MusicTnt.com
Are placing and offering our musical copyrighted materials with no
authorization from us. Therefore, we request their immediate removal.

1.        An electronic signature of the copyright owner, or a person
authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive copyright that
has allegedly been infringed. We hereby certify under we are the legal
owners of infringed musical compositions. If you require to have all
signed statement, please provide us your fax number, we will fax it to
you. 
2.        Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been
infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are
covered by a single notification, a representative list of such works on
that site. 1- DanceAge.com, 2- TakTaz.com, 3- NikTaz.com, 4-
ParsNava.com, 5- MusicTnt.com offer hundreds of our copyrighted
sound-recordings. Some links are as follow:

or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or

to permit to locate the material.

4.        Information reasonably sufficient to permit oftLayer to contact
the Complaining Party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the Complaining Party may
be contacted. 

Vartan Avanesian

Taraneh Enterprises Inc.
6914 Canby Ave Suite #106
reseda  ca  91335
USA
Tel: 818-7081166
Fax: 818-7080102
Email: avanesian@aol.com
<javascript:parent.ComposeTo('avanesian@aol.com', '');> 
www.Taranehrecords.com <http://www.taranehrecords.com/> 

5.        A statement that the Complaining Party has a good faith belief
that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I, Vartan Avanesian President of Taraneh Enterprises hereby testify
under penalty of perjury that Caltex Records is sole owner of the albums
/ sound recordings attached to this statement and 100% of copyright
ownership and publishing belongs to Taraneh Enterprises. We have not
authorized -      1- DanceAge.com, 2- TakTaz.com, 3- NikTaz.com, 4-
ParsNava.com, <http://www.radiojavan.com/>  5- MusicTnt.com
 to display, to promote, to solicit or to sell our copyrighted sound
recordings on the internet.
 Signed by:    VARTAN AVANESIAN

6.        A statement that the information in the notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is
the owner, or is authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. All above information is
accurate and Taraneh Enterprises inc. is the sole owner of the
sound-recordings, audio and video and we have all exclusive perpetual
worldwide right.

I hope to have provided you all you need.
 
Best regards.
VARTAN
